changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE timeseries ( id bigserial NOT NULL, file_id bigint NOT NULL, site_code text NOT NULL, platform_code text NOT NULL, deployment_code text NOT NULL, "LATITUDE" double precision, "LONGITUDE" double precision, geom geometry(Geometry,4326), time_coverage_start timestamp with time zone, time_coverage_end timestamp with time zone, abstract text, CONSTRAINT timeseries_pk PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT timeseries_file_fk FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES indexed_file (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT timeseries_deployment_uc UNIQUE (deployment_code), CONSTRAINT timeseries_geom_check CHECK (st_isvalid(geom)) );
CREATE INDEX timeseries_gist_idx ON timeseries USING GIST (geom);

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS abos_pulse_map; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW abos_pulse_map AS SELECT t.id AS timeseries_id, t.site_code, t.platform_code, t.deployment_code, t."LATITUDE", t."LONGITUDE", t.time_coverage_start AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_start, t.time_coverage_end AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_end, -- date(f.first_indexed AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') AS date_published, f.url AS file_url, f.size, t.geom FROM timeseries t JOIN indexed_file f ON t.file_id = f.id;
